name: ALFAWISE
0:
”Alexa, ask alfa bot to start cleaning.”
”Alexa, ask alfa bot to stop cleaning.”
”Alexa, ask alfa bot to start normal cleaning.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: alfa bot
des:
Want an automatic cleaner for floor or carpets? Just speak up! ALFAWISE vacuum cleaner is able to be controlled by speaker. To get started, make sure you have “ALFAWISE” and “Alexa” APP ready for operation in your phone. Then, you just need to enable the “ ALFAWISE” skill by clicking on the “Enable” button at the top of this screen. Once the skill is enabled, you will be asked to link with your “ALFAWISE” account. 
 
When all connection is ready built, you can simply control robot by saying: 
“Alexa, ask alfa bot to start cleaning.”
“Alexa, ask alfa bot to stop cleaning.”
“Alexa, ask alfa bot to finish cleaning.”
“Alexa, ask alfa bot to start recharging.”
“Alexa, ask alfa bot to start normal cleaning.”
“Alexa, ask alfa bot to start power cleaning.”
“Alexa, ask alfa bot to start quiet cleaning.”
“Alexa, ask alfa bot where it is.”
“Alexa, ask alfa bot for his status.” 

Tips: you must firstly bind your robot vacuum cleaner with “ALFAWISE” APP to use the Alexa voice control. 
Please make sure to use your “ALFAWISE” account to link Alexa skill. 
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us: support@Gearbest.com.
